original_text: Then these men said to each other, ‘We cannot find anything that Daniel does wrong in his work. We must find something that he does to obey the laws of his God.’
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 이 다니엘은 그 하나님의 율법에서 근거를 찾지 못하면 그를 고발할 수 없으리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then these men said to each other
that Daniel does wrong in his work
that he does to obey the laws of his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 하나님의 법을 순종하기 위해 하는 것을
